channel.title: Project Dungeon Fest 562/659 Sled Help! Repp++!@!@
channel.description: Ok. so, when i spawned a sled. it had "ride sled" and it wouldn't let me ride it. Does anyone know how i could fix this?

item.title: Project Dungeon Fest 562/659 Sled Help! Repp++!@!@
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

It hasn’t been programmed to do such a thing. “Ride sled” is just text. You have to tell the server that you want to have the character in the “ride sled” position instead of wielding it which is the default, when you click the ItemOptionFirstPacket or whatever.

Read full topic
item.source: Project Dungeon Fest 562/659 Sled Help! Repp++!@!@
